content: Shigandang is a secret optional Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. Secretly buried not far from another Yaoguai King, you'll need to seek out six Buddha Statue Eyeballs to unlock this boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
Shigandang is a secret optional Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. Secretly buried not far from another Yaoguai King, you'll need to seek out six Buddha Statue Eyeballs to unlock this boss.
